tool_description:
Best Instagram Scraper & Downloader 2023
● Launched in July 2023
● Download HD stories, highlights, reels, posts, profiles, reel audios (no-CORS media)
● 100% real-time data, user posts, user info, hashtag, reels & many more
name: Instagram Bulk Scraper Latest
title: Instagram Bulk Scraper Latest

api_list.name: Download HD Story by URL
api_list.description:
Download HD story image & video from story url.
You can also embed this media in your website. You won't face CORS issue.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com/download_story_from_url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
